original_title: All Day / I Feel Like That
overview: Steve McQueen-directed music video for two, non-album Kanye West songs. Originally screened for a select audience at the Los Angeles County Museum of Art and during the close of Paris Fashion Week in March of 2015. The video was shot in three takes and the third take was ultimately used -- it features Kanye dancing and roaming around an abandoned warehouse. "I elevated my palate. I wanted him to be in charge,” he said of the process in July of 2015. “It wasn't overly thought out."
title: All Day / I Feel Like That
